lore: The authorities of Rodia forbid the cultivation of corn to any species other than the Pilwiz, due to the mysterious accidents that the competition would otherwise suffer. In exchange, the Council of Economy has a say in the prices of corn to prevent abuse.\n\nThe Flamehook Pilwiz is immune to the heat of fire. It has an essential job, as it can absorb fire to save the crops if necessary. They sometimes come into conflict with the Ents, as they burn forest plots to cultivate them.
menagerieDialog: (No one works the land quite like the Pilwiz, but this one seems to prefer lazing around.)
(It's repeatedly slashing at the air with its scythes.)
(It's trimming some flowers, because what else is a creature with scythes for limbs supposed to do in their free time?)
(Its gaze is lost in the distance, as if yearning to be someplace else.)
(This creature's lifelong dream is to become a gardener. Unfortunately for it, you've decided to enlist it into a lifetime of warfare.)
name: Flamehook Pilwiz
